title: How Can I View and Set the SMSC?
answer:
The SC address option is used to save the Short Message Service Center (SMSC) number (consult the network operator for the number). You can send messages only after the SMSC number is set.
To set the SMSC number, select Main menu > Messages > SMS > Settings > Profile settings > Profile 1 > SC address, and then enter the SMSC number provided by the network operator.
